comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Thine is the glory, risen, conqu'ring Son; endless is the vict'ry Thou o’er death hast won. Angels in bright raiment rolled the stone away, kept the folded grave-clothes where Thy body lay.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Thine be the glory, risen, conqu'ring Son; endless is the vict'ry Thou o’er death hast won.
